guest.name: Kim Scott
guest.title: Author & Executive Coach
guest.background: Kim Scott is the author of 'Radical Candor' and 'Radical Respect'. She was previously a CEO coach at Dropbox, Qualtrics, and Twitter, a faculty member at Apple University, and led AdSense, YouTube, and DoubleClick teams at Google.
guest.background_zh: Kim Scott 是畅销书《绝对坦诚》(Radical Candor) 和《Radical Respect》的作者。她曾担任 Dropbox、Qualtrics 和 Twitter 的 CEO 教练，Apple University 的教员，并在 Google 领导过 AdSense、YouTube 和 DoubleClick 团队。

episodeSummary: Kim Scott breaks down the misconceptions of feedback, explaining that Radical Candor is the intersection of caring personally and challenging directly. She provides tactical frameworks for moving away from 'ruinous empathy' and gives leaders concrete scripts and steps to solicit, give, and gauge feedback effectively.
episodeSummary_zh: Kim Scott 深入剖析了关于反馈的常见误区，指出“绝对坦诚”是“个体关怀”与“直接挑战”的结合点。她提供了一套战术性的框架，帮助管理者摆脱“毁灭性同理心”，并给出了具体的沟通脚本和步骤，用于有效地征集、提供和评估反馈。
